project_fp: filepath for where you store the project data (keep separate from the repository
projected_crs_epsg: the EPSG code for the projected coordinate reference system (used epsg:2240 for this project
geofabrik_fp: filepath to where you want to store the OSM geofabrik extract
geofabrik_year: the year of OSM geofabrik in YY format (23 used in this project) or 'current' for the most current available extract
geofabrik_state: the state(s) to download geofabrik extracts for (full name in lowercase, if state has a space use a '-', if multiple separate with commas)
usgs_fp: where you want the USGS data to be stored
otherdata_fp: supplemental data that you want to refernce
basemap_api_keys: this JSON gets turned into a dictionary that is imported for all notebooks, so you can also put api keys in here to make them accessible
